kalaya wegayen gewi yannata wiya.ee 2006 warshaya yi.game pansale pradhana dayakayek wu ohuta ema wasare katina pinkama bhara wuni.ketharam waradi kalath sasare kala pinata bauddha pawulaka upan ohuta me awasthawa otunu paladuwa ha samana wiya.diwa ra ohuge sithe randi thibune katina pinkama yi.nithara ma kathawa da palamu katina chiwaraya budurajanan wahanse udesa puja kirima ganayi.katina chiwaraya hise thiya gena hewisi handa madhyaye maha peraharin pansalata yana andamath eya bhagyawath arahath munindun udesa puja karana andama ohuta mawi penennata wiya.agosthu masaya uda wiya.katina pinakamata thawa ithiri wa aththe sathi kipayak pamani.
